data.actual_result: The pinned messages cover the unpinning message modal window.
data.expected_result: Unpinning message modal should have a "higher position" than the unpinning message modal window.
data.short_description: Z-index issue with removing pinned message modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Pin any message - Open pinned messages - Unpin the pinned message - Observe the z-index of the modal window
